name: @pesto-io/zod-reify
description: Pesto module to intantiate zod schema from Typescript source code as string.

scripts.gen:api-docs:html: pnpm run clean:api-docs:astro && pnpm exec typedoc ./src/index.ts --out ./docs/  --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json
scripts.gen:api-docs:json: pnpm run clean:api-docs:astro && pnpm exec typedoc ./src/index.ts  --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --json documentation/astro/src/content/api-docs/data.json
scripts.gen:api-docs:md: pnpm run clean:api-docs:astro && pnpm exec typedoc ./src/index.ts --out documentation/astro/src/content/api-docs/  --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --plugin typedoc-plugin-frontmatter
scripts.gen:api-docs:astro: pnpm run clean:api-docs:astro && pnpm run gen:api-docs:json && pnpm run gen:api-docs:zod
scripts.gen:api-docs: pnpm run clean:api-docs && pnpm run gen:api-docs:html
scripts.build:docs:astro: pnpm i --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run gen:api-docs:astro && cd documentation/astro/ && pnpm i --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run build
scripts.dev:docs:astro: pnpm run gen:api-docs:astro && cd documentation/astro/ && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:docs: pnpm run gen:api-docs && pnpm exec serve docs/
scripts.clean: rm -Rf rawData && rm -Rf transformedData && rm -fr dist/

author: The Pesto Team
